TowerDefenseControl.102001.1: [Event Period]21:00, Dec 01, 2025 – 19:59, Dec 08, 2025[Requirements]Authorization Level ≥5, with the Event feature unlocked.[Details]1. Defend the forest with Nazuna using the Trekker Chess. Trekkers will enter the stage as Chess Pieces to assist in battle.2. Clear stages and complete event missions to obtain generous rewards and a limited Honor Title!
TowerDefenseControl.102002.1: [Event Period]21:00, Jan 26, 2026 – 20:00, Feb 02, 2026[Participation Requirements]Reach Authorization Level 5 or higher and unlock the Event feature.[Event Rules]1. Team up with Nazuna and protect the forest with chess pieces. Familiar Trekkers will appear as pieces to aid you in battle.2. Clear stages to finish event missions and earn great rewards along with limited titles.
